issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/198973

# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check);

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/198973

issue.title: avinor.no
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.66.4

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.avinor.no/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

AdGuard Cookie Notices filter

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

### Issue:
Page appears frozen (nothing can be clicked).

### Problem filter:
* **AdGuard Cookie Notices filter**

### Problem rule:
`##.cookie-banner:not(body):not(html)`

### Screenshot:
Pointless, since the non-working frozen page looks identical to the working one.

### Other problem filters:
* **I don't care about cookies** _**(DISCONTINUED)**_
```
~towerhousewares.co.uk,~stadtwerke-flensburg.de,~hepster.com,~zentrale-pruefstelle-praevention.de,~bookmygarage.com,~deineapotheke.at,~swedbank.se,~sparbankentanum.se,~swedbank.com,~planeo.de,~dogedash.com,~teacheconomy.de,~sevdesk.de,~sevdesk.at,~nintendo.com,~veygo.com,~puratos.pl,~bike-components.de,~bremerhaven.de,~onlinedepartment.nl,~voltadol.at,~gsk-gebro.at,~shop.halebop.se,~nuxeo.com,~opngo.com,~sachsenallee.de,~melcloud.com,~intersport.de##.cookie-banner:not(body):not(html)
```
--

### System info:
* OS/version: Windows 10 Pro 22H2 (x64)
* Browser/version: LibreWolf v143.0.4-1 (x64) [Tracking Protection = Standard]
* Adblock Extension/version: uBlock Origin v1.66.4

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
I rather meant the opposite approach, but the meaning remains the same: a cosmetic filter for a list 'deprecated' from being trusted will ruin the site.

In fact, if a higher delay is required, emergency message hiding will probably be added anyway (the worst case scenario is when the click occurs on the second visit within a short time interval).


It's a bit of a bummer that removing the element from the DOM (`#$#.cookie-banner { remove: true }`) doesn't help here (after the second visit, the navigation in the header straightens out).

comment.body:
Not reproduced with AdGuard filters on my end.
Try to leave only AdGuard filters from the list below, update them (wait almost one minute there), clear browser data, restart it, open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).
```
AdGuard Base
AdGuard Tracking Protection
AdGuard Cookie Notices
AdGuard Popups
AdGuard Mobile App Banners
AdGuard Other Annoyances
```

issue.title: avinor.no
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.66.4

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.avinor.no/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

AdGuard Cookie Notices filter

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

### Issue:
Page appears frozen (nothing can be clicked).

### Problem filter:
* **AdGuard Cookie Notices filter**

### Problem rule:
`##.cookie-banner:not(body):not(html)`

### Screenshot:
Pointless, since the non-working frozen page looks identical to the working one.

### Other problem filters:
* **I don't care about cookies** _**(DISCONTINUED)**_
```
~towerhousewares.co.uk,~stadtwerke-flensburg.de,~hepster.com,~zentrale-pruefstelle-praevention.de,~bookmygarage.com,~deineapotheke.at,~swedbank.se,~sparbankentanum.se,~swedbank.com,~planeo.de,~dogedash.com,~teacheconomy.de,~sevdesk.de,~sevdesk.at,~nintendo.com,~veygo.com,~puratos.pl,~bike-components.de,~bremerhaven.de,~onlinedepartment.nl,~voltadol.at,~gsk-gebro.at,~shop.halebop.se,~nuxeo.com,~opngo.com,~sachsenallee.de,~melcloud.com,~intersport.de##.cookie-banner:not(body):not(html)
```
--

### System info:
* OS/version: Windows 10 Pro 22H2 (x64)
* Browser/version: LibreWolf v143.0.4-1 (x64) [Tracking Protection = Standard]
* Adblock Extension/version: uBlock Origin v1.66.4

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
> a cosmetic filter for a list 'deprecated' from being trusted will ruin the site.

As you pointed out yourself; not trusting **ublock-** filters in uBO is not possible,
So breakage will only occur if someone is using '**uBlock filters - Cookie Notices**' in a different blocker than uBO (e.g. in ABP, or something).
Don't see why anyone would do that.

comment.body:
Dzikuj.

Jak rozumiem to nie jest spowodowane filtrami, wic zgosiem problem tutaj - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardForAndroid/issues/5878
Zgaduj, e aplikacja `ZEN.COM` zostanie dodana do wyjtkw, wtedy prawdopodobnie opcja "Kieruj ruch przez AdGuard" bdzie wyczona domylnie. To chyba obecnie jedyne rozwizanie problemu.

issue.title: avinor.no
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.66.4

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.avinor.no/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

AdGuard Cookie Notices filter

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

### Issue:
Page appears frozen (nothing can be clicked).

### Problem filter:
* **AdGuard Cookie Notices filter**

### Problem rule:
`##.cookie-banner:not(body):not(html)`

### Screenshot:
Pointless, since the non-working frozen page looks identical to the working one.

### Other problem filters:
* **I don't care about cookies** _**(DISCONTINUED)**_
```
~towerhousewares.co.uk,~stadtwerke-flensburg.de,~hepster.com,~zentrale-pruefstelle-praevention.de,~bookmygarage.com,~deineapotheke.at,~swedbank.se,~sparbankentanum.se,~swedbank.com,~planeo.de,~dogedash.com,~teacheconomy.de,~sevdesk.de,~sevdesk.at,~nintendo.com,~veygo.com,~puratos.pl,~bike-components.de,~bremerhaven.de,~onlinedepartment.nl,~voltadol.at,~gsk-gebro.at,~shop.halebop.se,~nuxeo.com,~opngo.com,~sachsenallee.de,~melcloud.com,~intersport.de##.cookie-banner:not(body):not(html)
```
--

### System info:
* OS/version: Windows 10 Pro 22H2 (x64)
* Browser/version: LibreWolf v143.0.4-1 (x64) [Tracking Protection = Standard]
* Adblock Extension/version: uBlock Origin v1.66.4

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: No, it is possible, just remove this one value from the trusted prefixes "section"  in advanced settings or add "r" after the minus (without separate by space before minus, because there is no ublock-r... list in https://github.com/gorhill/uBlock/blob/5e2b85d53df2d5b0404cbad35b21f0eaf1c187b5/assets/assets.json) and we have 1717 lines marked as incorrect (requiring elevated privileges).
